name: Tetris Fantasy
description:
This is a unique Tetris casual game. The unique box combo system will double the fun, coupled with the generous and exquisite CG rewards, will definitely make you want to stop~

Simple operation mode: the arrow keys control movement left and right, rotate the block clockwise upwards, and accelerate downwards.
Novel combo system: You will get extra combo points when you eliminate them within a continuous period of time. Simply put, the more you eliminate the faster, the faster the score increases.
Exquisite CG reward: You can get a card pack to open the CG by accumulating the progress bar through the score. If you are lucky, you can directly get a full high-definition original CG~
